items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex, Nifty likely to start up; Auto cos eyed
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian benchmark indices BSE Sensex and Nifty 50 were likely to open on a positive note, as indicated by higher GIFT Nifty futures.

items.title: Stocks to Watch: Eicher, MSIL, NBCC, Biocon, Insecticides India, KIMS
items.description: Sales of Royal Enfield motorcycles fell 5 per cent to 73,629 units in August 2024, compared to 77,583 units in the year ago period. Meanwhile, their exports dropped 2 per cent to 8,006 units YoY.

items.title: Asian share mkts off to a quiet start, dollar firm ahead of US jobs report
items.description: The dollar was hanging on to gains made on Friday after upbeat spending figures led markets to trim the chance of a half-point easing from the Federal Reserve

items.title: Broader market shows weakness after action packed August; trading tips here
items.description: August was an action-packed month, initially marked by sharp declines as prices corrected from 25,000 to 24,000 in just three days

items.title: Nifty50, MidCap Select index hit key resistance; should you book profits?
items.description: The Nifty Midcap Select Index has recently approached its resistance level at 13,200. This level is likely to act as a barrier to further upward movement, causing the index to halt its rally

items.title: SDBL, Hikal among today's top stock picks by Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi
items.description: Between March 2023 and June 2024, Hikal Limited's stock was in a consolidation phase, trading within a relatively narrow range of Rs 260 to Rs 320

items.title: Rajesh Bhosale of Angel One recommends buying these two stocks today

items.title: Why Sebi is facing criticism over ICICI Securities, ICICI Bank merger
items.description: Facing an unprecedented attack on its credibility, the last thing that the SEBI would want is to give the impression that while all M&A is equal, some transactions are more equal than others

items.title: Dividend, Stock Split: These shares trade ex-date today; are you eligible?
items.description: A dividend is a portion of a company's earnings distributed to its shareholders, representing a reward for investors, typically paid out on a quarterly or annual basis

items.title: Emkay ups Nifty Sept 2025 target to 26,000; 'extended' sideways move likely
items.description: Emkay Global has raised the Nifty50 target to 26,000 for September 2025 on the back of rate cuts, revival in rural consumption, and earnings growth

items.title: Indian govt bond yields seen marginally higher, tracking US peers
items.description: Markets are fully pricing in a rate cut of at least 25 basis points at the Fed's mid-September meeting

items.title: F&O Cues: Options data hint more gains for Nifty; 4 stocks see long buildup
items.description: Derivative market update for Monday, Sept 02: FIIs long-short ratio in index futures rose to 2.6:1, implying 5 longs for every 2 shorts. Bandhan Bank, Syngene and Granules India see long buildup.

items.title: Weekly Outlook: Nifty eyes 25,550; but this chart pattern can derail rally
items.description: Market outlook for Sept 02 - 07, 2024: The Nifty seems favourably placed on the short-term chart; but formation of 'Hanging Man' pattern on the monthly chart may be a reason to worry going ahead.

items.title: Gujarat Gas stock flies 14% on merger, demerger plan; brokerages upbeat
items.description: Brokerages see an upside of up to 23 per cent in Gujarat Gas stock as they believe that the restructuring of these Gujarat companies will simplify the existing layered structure.

items.title: Brokerages BULLISH on Gala Precision IPO; GMP jumps 45%; Should You Bid?
items.description: Several brokerages, including Deven Choksi Research, Anand Rathi, Swastika Investmart, and Choice, have shared their outlook on the Gala Precision Engineering IPO for the investors

items.title: Indian Hume Pipe surges 14% on securing LoI for order worth Rs 859 crore
items.description: Indian Hume Pipe has received a letter of intent, with order value of Rs 858.88 crore from Tapi Irrigation Development Corp, Jalgaon, for the construction of gravity piped distribution network.

items.title: GPT Infra stock gains 5% on emerging as lowest bidder for Rs 204-cr projet
items.description: The rise in GPT Infra share price came after the company announced that it has emerged as the lowest bidder (L-1) for a project worth Rs 204 crore from CAO Construction, South Eastern Railway Kolkata.

items.title: SJVN, RailTel, NHPC get 'Navratna' status; stocks rise up to 5.2%
items.description: SJVN, NHPC and RailTel shares climb after government grants 'Navratna' status

items.title: Globus Spirits zooms 28% in two days; Motilal Oswal MF buys 0.7% stake
items.description: Motilal Oswal Mutual Fund purchased 200,000 equity shares, representing a 0.69 per cent of the total equity of Globus Spirits on Friday, August 30, via block deal on the NSE.

items.title: MOIL shares slump over 3% after price reduction of manganese ore; details
items.description: The stock prices of MOIL slipped after the company announced that effective September 1, 2024, it will reduce prices across several categories of Manganese Ore and related products

items.title: Nifty's winning run extends to 13th day in longest uninterrupted streak
items.description: During these 13 trading sessions, starting August 14, the Nifty has rallied 1,150 points, or 4.7 per cent

items.title: August auto sales impact: Hero, Eicher, and Maruti gain; TaMo, TVS slip
items.description: Automaker Tata Motors saw an 8.1 per cent drop in total sales for August 2024, totaling 71,693 vehicles compared to 78,010 units in August 2023.

items.title: Centum Electronics share price rises 4% on bagging work order from DRDO
items.description: Under the terms of the project, Centum Electronics will be providing Intersatellite Link & other Payload Subsystems to DRDO.

items.title: Technical outlook on gas-related stocks post Gujarat Gas, GSPL merger plan
items.description: Gujarat Gas, GSPL, MGL, IGL and Petronet LNG: Trading strategies for gas-related stocks as Gujarat Gas announces biz restructuring plan. Find out which stock look stronger on charts here.

items.title: Fortis Health hits 52-week high on plans to buy 32% stake in subsidiary
items.description: Fortis Healthcare's stock price today surged after the healthcare company said that it will buy the entire 31.52 per cent stake held by private equity investors in the material wholly owned subsidiary

items.title: ITC share price gains 2%, hits new high on hopes of bullish growth outlook
items.description: ITC share price: Analysts anticipates a promising outlook for H2FY25E, with accelerated pricing growth and gradual recovery in rural FMCG, bolstering the Company's performance

items.title: Dynacons Systems gets Rs 143-cr order from Bank of Maharashtra; stock up 4%
items.description: The rise in Dynacons Systems share price came after the company announced that it has bagged an order worth Rs 142.55 crore from Bank of Maharashtra.

items.title: CESC soars 3% on incorporating new subsidiary in renewable power sector
items.description: CESC stock price surged up to 3.2 per cent at Rs 200.60 per share on the BSE in Monday's intraday trade

items.description: The three-day subscription window to bid for the Bazaar Style Retail IPO, available at a price band of Rs 370-389 and a lot size of 38 shares, closes tomorrow

items.title: HCL Tech's market cap nears Rs 5 trillion; stock zooms 46% from June low
items.description: With HCL Tech's stock up 3 per cent at 11:58 AM, the market cap of the company stood at Rs 4.9 trillion, and 2 per cent away from the Rs 5-trillion-mark, exchange data showed.

items.title: Conflict of interest: Buch drew salary from ICICI while at Sebi, says Congress
items.description: Congress leader Pawan Khera accuses Buch of receiving remuneration not only from the government but also from ICICI Bank and ICICI Prudential.

items.title: Dixon Technologies share price slips 5% in firm market; here's why

items.title: Dr Reddy's declines 3% after China's regulator bans import of ADHD drug
items.description: Atomoxetine is used for treating attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) in adults and children over six years.

items.description: The clarification came after the country's opposition party alleged that Buch continued to draw a salary from the bank
